Neil! for Godsake! Why didn't you tell us

Neil! for Godsake! Why didn’t you tell us {#h.y4tgd9lhk6dj .zfr3Q .JYVBee dir=”ltr” style=”text-align: center;”}

Not to rub salt in all of our wounds but Neil! for Godsake! Why didn’t you tell us this 3 months ago in March when it could have stoped this lockdown death march!
